pm_hazardous_weather.zhcn_desc: 这个星球上充斥着难以估计的天气变化，经常突然地出现猛烈的风暴，在地表造成浩劫。
pm_hazardous_weather.en_desc: This world suffers from unstable weather patterns, with violent storms frequently appearing out of nowhere to wreak havoc on the surface.
pm_hazardous_weather.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§R-10%§!
幸福度：§R-5%§!
来自£job£ 岗位的 £energy£ 能量币：§G+20%§!
发电区划最大建造数量：§G+4§!

pm_dangerous_wildlife.zhcn_desc: 这个星球现在塞满了想要闹事的动物，随时准备将任何在行星表面活动的生物变成他们的午饭，但同时，它们的生物行为也能够提供繁多的科研机会。
pm_dangerous_wildlife.en_desc: This world has evolved extremely Hostile Fauna, and the surface is rife with lethal predators waiting to ambush their next meal. Their biology offers great research opportunities, however.
pm_dangerous_wildlife.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-10%§!\n幸福度：§R-5%§!\n来自£job£ 岗位的£society_research£ 社会学研究：§G+20%§!

pm_weak_magnetic_field.zhcn_desc: 尽管可以居住，但这个星球上极弱甚至不存在的磁场使得来自宇宙的辐射如入无人之境。
pm_weak_magnetic_field.en_desc: Although habitable, this world has a weak or non-existent magnetic field that offers little protection against cosmic radiation.

pm_unstable_tectonics.zhcn_desc: 这个星球拥有非常不稳定的板块构造，容易出现大规模地震和火山爆发。
pm_unstable_tectonics.en_desc: This world has very unstable plate tectonics and is prone to massive earthquakes and volcanic activity.

pm_tidal_locked.zhcn_desc: 这个星球被其环绕的恒星锁定，这代表着它将不能进行自转，星球的两边分别是永恒的光明与永恒的黑暗，如果这个世界真的存在着生物，那么就只能出现在两边的交界线上。
pm_tidal_locked.en_desc: This world is tidally locked around its star, meaning that one side always has daylight while the other is locked in eternal darkness. If life exists here, it is likely limited to the twilight regions where the two sides meet.

pm_chthonian_planet.zhcn_desc: 这个星球曾是一个气态巨行星，但因为过于接近恒星，其大气层被烧毁殆尽，只留下了一个密度密度，矿产丰富的星核。
pm_chthonian_planet.en_desc: This planet was once a gas giant, but its proximity to its star has burned away the thick atmosphere. All that remains now is a super-dense and mineral rich metallic core.

pm_asteroid_impacts.zhcn_desc: 这个星球的轨道上散落着数目繁多的小行星，流星和彗星群，并经常撞击其表面。
pm_asteroid_impacts.en_desc: The orbital path this world takes around its star is littered with small asteroids, meteors, and comet swarms. Large impacts on the surface occur at an alarming frequency.

pm_extensive_moon_system.en_desc: This gas giant has an unusually large amount of natural satellites. Hundreds of small moons and moonlets orbit the planet.

pm_mineral_poor.zhcn_desc: 人们至今仍不清楚这颗行星究竟是生来如此，亦或是某种未知物种曾经到来将它的许多珍贵资源攫取一空。无论怎样，我们清楚的是这颗行星现在的矿物质量异常低劣。
pm_mineral_poor.en_desc: It is unknown if this planet simply formed this way, or if some unknown race once stripped it of its more valuable resources. However, we do know that the minerals present on this planet are of unusually poor quality.
pm_mineral_poor.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§R-25%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§R-3§!

pm_asteroid_belt.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星的某个卫星可能是因一场灾难而被毁灭，也有可能这本身就是一堆轨道碎片。不管是什么原因导致的，这颗行星如今被一条小行星带环绕着。
pm_asteroid_belt.en_desc: Perhaps this planet once had a moon which was destroyed in some calamity, or perhaps its orbital debris never fully coalesced in the first place. Whatever the cause, this planet is surrounded by a belt of small asteroids.
pm_asteroid_belt.zhcn_modifier: £job£ 岗位生产的£minerals£ 矿物：§G+10%§!\n采矿区划最大建造数量：§G+3§!

pm_atmospheric_hallucinogen.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的空气里似乎含有某种天然的致幻剂。它确实能使人心情愉悦，也似乎能让某些物理学之谜变得易解；可同时也会让人无法集中精力。
pm_atmospheric_hallucinogen.en_desc: The air of this planet contains a natural hallucinogen. While this does keep people happy, and indeed seems to aid the visualization of some of the more esoteric Physics problems, it also distracts people from other work.

№修正数量> 1

pm_lush.zhcn_desc: 生命在这个星球上蓬勃发展，动植物种类繁多，且生长迅速而繁盛。
pm_lush.en_desc: Life thrives here, the fauna is plentiful and the flora grows rapidly.
pm_lush.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§G+10%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§G+20%§!\n农业区划最大建造数量：§G+4§!

pm_bleak.zhcn_desc: 生物难以在这里生存，尽管有些物种顽强地寓居于此，它们也都瘦小而虚弱。
pm_bleak.en_desc: Life struggles to survive here, and while some clings to a tenacious existence it is anemic and sickly.
pm_bleak.zhcn_modifier: 宜居性：§R-5%§!\n£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-10%§!\n农业区划最大建造数量：§R-2§!

pm_irradiated.zhcn_desc: 一场很久以前的灾难让这颗星球笼罩在严重的辐射之中。
pm_irradiated.en_desc: Some long-ago calamity rendered this planet rather heavily irradiated.
pm_irradiated.zhcn_modifier:
宜居性：§R-10%§!
有机人口幸福度：§R-20%§!
£job£ 岗位生产的£food£ 食物：§R-50%§!

pm_ancient_automation.zhcn_desc: 尽管历史悠久，但星球上的机器仍为我们的生产工作提供了良好的帮助。
pm_ancient_automation.en_desc: Ancient, yet helpful, machines aid our production on this planet.

pm_ancient_factory.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星上的一座古代工厂仍然可以运作。
pm_ancient_factory.en_desc: An ancient factory on this planet is still in operation condition.

pm_robot_workers.zhcn_desc: 由某个遗落文明所制造的机器人劳工仍留存在这颗行星上。在采取适当的防范措施后，这些机器人就能为我们效命了。
pm_robot_workers.en_desc: Robot workers from a forgotten civilization remain on this planet. With the proper precautions, they could be put to work for us.

pm_ancient_forgeworld.zhcn_desc: 这颗行星原本是某个遗落文明的工业制造中心。尽管只有一小部分仪器仍然能运行，但也为我们的工业作出了很好的示范。
pm_ancient_forgeworld.en_desc: This planet was once some kind of center of production for a forgotten civilization. Although only a shadow of its former capacity remains in working condition, it is still an impressive example of industry.

pm_ancient_weapon.zhcn_desc: 这颗星球的原文明种群似乎在其轨道上建造了某种巨型武器。尽管无法使用且看上去也是尚未完成的状态，不过通过研究它我们还是可以学到一些东西。
pm_ancient_weapon.en_desc: It seems that some long-forgotten race once build some kind of huge weapon in orbit above this world. While it doesn't work, indeed it doesn't appear to have been completed, we can likely learn a few things by studying it.
